TextView.android:text:
Raison is a background service that run at startup and allow you to wake up your phone rasining it!

Every x seconds (x=3 by default) it checks the orientation of your phone. When the service notices that you changed the position of your phone from horizontal to an inclined position it wakes up the screen.

If your phone kills the service open the app to restart it.

Uninstall the application to remove this service.
